about_the_game:
Run, hide, and dodge your way through the most dangerous mission of all - avoiding family gatherings!

Your worst nightmare has come true: your uncle is going to be the next chief of the clan, and EVERYONE is invited. As an introverted teenager in a vibrant Arabic village where "personal space" is an alien concept, you'll need all your wit and stealth skills to survive through the entire day of endless hugs, cheek pinches, and the dreaded "have you eaten yet?" questions.

But here's the catch - you still need to congratulate your uncle! Can you navigate through houses packed with well-meaning relatives, dodge the aunties armed with food, and escape the cousins who won't stop asking about your grades? 

EMBRACE THE CHAOS

Master the art of reverse stealth in this unique action-adventure game. Hide behind closets, dive over tables, and throw random objects to stun others that are chasing you. Your relatives' love knows no bounds - and apparently, neither do their detection skills! 

YOUR ARSENAL OF AVOIDANCE

  • Strategic Closets: From the living room to kitchen, turn any closet into your sanctuary

  • Quick Thinking: Use household items to create diversions. That vase might just save your life!

  • Parkour Your Way Out: Who knew running from love could make you so athletic?

  • Social Engineering: Learn each relative's patterns and behaviors to plan your escape routes

Explore a charming world inspired by real Arabic architecture, filled with cultural details, and the warmth of Arabic hospitality (even if you're trying to avoid it). Each house tells its own story, hiding secrets and surprises behind every door. 

MORE THAN JUST AN ESCAPE

As you dodge and weave through the family gathering, you'll discover there's more to your mission than simple avoidance. Uncover family secrets, solve environmental puzzles, and maybe - just maybe - learn that some traditions are worth embracing.

FEATURES

  • Rich, culturally inspired world design

  • Creative puzzle-solving using everyday objects

  • Hilarious interactions with family members

  • Multiple escape routes and strategies

  • Authentic Arabic village atmosphere

  • A heartwarming story about family, tradition, and finding your place 

Remember: In Arabic culture, "Azooma" means a gathering or invitation - and in this game, it's your greatest challenge. Will you successfully navigate the social maze, or will you end up trapped in an endless cycle of cheek pinches and force-feeding? 

Perfect for players who love stealth games, cultural experiences, and anyone who's ever hidden from relatives during a family gathering!

short_description: "Azooma Escape" is a fast-paced, comedic stealth adventure where a Saudi young guest tries to sneak out of an overly generous gathering before being force-fed hospitality. Navigate crowded rooms, dodge aggressive hosts, and solve puzzles in a hilarious, culturally inspired escape mission.
